gopen¶

dlinputs.gopen.find_shards(urls, size=17, complete=False)[source]¶

Given a list of shard URLs, find the first one that exists.

dlinputs.gopen.gopen(url, mode='rb')[source]¶

Open the given URL. Supports unusual schemes and uses subprocesses.

dlinputs.gopen.sharditerator(url, epochs=1000000, shuffle=True, **kw)[source]¶

Iterate over sharded tar records.

dlinputs.gopen.sharditerator_multi(url, epochs=1000000, shuffle=True, multi=1, **kw)[source]¶

Iterate over sharded tar records, opening multiple shards in parallel.

dlinputs.gopen.sharditerator_once(url, **kw)[source]¶

Iterate over sharded tar records (no shuffling, one epoch only).

dlinputs.gopen.test_curl_write(self, location)[source]¶

Test whether we can write to a location using curl.

dlinputs.gopen.test_shards(url, size=17, complete=False)[source]¶

Test whether the shard spec is accessible.

dlinputs.gopen.test_url(url, size=17)[source]¶

Test whether the given URL is accessible.
